DataElement.preferredName: External Beam Radiation Therapy Prostate Prescription Facility Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a text field to identify an institution at which medical orders were prepared to specify dosage for therapeutic application of radiation using high-energy rays targeting the prostate gland.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: External Beam Radiation Therapy Prostate Prescription Facility
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to the institution at which medical orders were given to specify dosage for therapeutic application of radiation using high-energy rays targeting the prostate gland (male reproductive organ).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (ray-dee-AY-shun) Radiation therapy that uses a machine to aim high-energy rays at the cancer.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy in which high-energy beams are delivered to the tumor from outside of the body.

Property.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention.:Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
A verbal or written order given by an authorized person instructing a patient to obtain and use a medical device, prescription or undergo a procedure.
Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: updated for ISO compliance to develop data element similar to retired concept

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to identify the geographic name or location of a person, place, or thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: all components of an address, including building number, street name and type, city, state, postal code, and country.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

DataElement.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: modified after clarification by group for use of field on CRF
